title: My internet crashed and i logged back in before game ended
body: My interent crashed so i had to log out and in again and in that time 2 kills had already happened. And when i logged in i was able to vote for remake and i still was given a ban WHY i made it back in time before game ended so WHY a ban!

replies.body:
The /Remake System marks anyone who is inactive for 90 seconds or more during the first 3 minutes of a match. If a player is marked by the system, a /Remake becomes available at 3 minutes and the affected team votes to pass it. If the remake vote passes, the players who were marked will receive a loss for the match and if a trend of this happens, will see a low-priority queue. 

Feel free to reference [our FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ) on this system if you'd like more information on it. Let me know if you have any other questions.
